properties.explanationtext: When a meeting occurred, a presentation was given, or a blog post was published.
Type of the activity. Select "Other" if none of the other options are appropriate.

settings.DataSource: Social ProductFeedback;UX, engineering, product, or product marketing feedback and collaboration CommercialFeedback;Marketing, sales, or partner strategy feedback and collaboration SuccessFeedback;Support, documentation, or training feedback and collaboration BlogPostcastVideo;Blog, Podcast, Video VirtualEvent;Virtual event InPersonEvent;In-person event OpenSourceSoftware;Open-source software Other

properties.explanationtext: URL for the activity, if applicable.
1-2 short sentences to explain the context of the activity.

settings.Placeholder: ex: Meeting with product team to discuss new SaaS observability features. Or, competitive analysis discussion with product marketing.

properties.explanationtext: Any individuals directly participating in this activity with you.

settings.Placeholder: ex: Debbie Tucek, Kristina from Kentico's UX team

properties.explanationtext: How impactful do you think the activity was? 1 lowest - 5 highest.
How much effort did this activity require? 1 lowest - 5 highest.
How satisfied do you feel with your impact vs effort? 1 lowest - 5 highest.
